object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.DUStateChangeComplete.{i}.
object.description: This table contains information about any operation on software modules for which the result must be notified to the ACS. Two types of notification could be sent: DU STATE CHANGE COMPLETE Inform, in case the ACS asked for the software module update with ChangeDUState RPC. AUTONOMOUS DU STATE CHANGE COMPLETE Inform, in case the software module update was not specifically asked by the ACS.

parameter.name: Autonomous
parameter.description: This value is {{true}} in case this entry is related to autonomous software module update, {{false}} if related to the result of a ChangeDUState RPC by ACS.

parameter.name: CommandKey
parameter.description: The value of the CommandKey argument passed to the CPE in the corresponding ChangeDUState RPC. This value is empty in case {{param|Autonomous}} is {{true}}.

object.name: ManagementServer.X_ADB_CWMPState.DUStateChangeComplete.{i}.Operation.{i}.
object.description: Table of operations that are reported within the (Autonomous)DUStateChangeComplete message.

parameter.name: URL
parameter.description: The URL that specifies the location of the DU to be installed.

parameter.name: UUID
parameter.description: The UUID as defined in RFC 4122 of the DU that was affected.

parameter.name: Username
parameter.description: Username to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.

parameter.name: Password
parameter.description: Password to be used by the CPE to authenticate with the file server, if authentication is required.

parameter.name: ExecutionEnvRef
parameter.description: A reference to the Execution Environment upon which the DU is to be installed.

parameter.name: DeploymentUnitRef
parameter.description: A reference to the DU affected.

parameter.name: Version
parameter.description: The version of the DU affected.

parameter.name: CurrentState
parameter.description: The state of the operation. {{enum|None}} means the operation has not been performed yet. Otherwise, reports the state attained either by completing the requested operation or reflecting the state of the DU after a failed attempt to change its state.

parameter.name: Resolved
parameter.description: Whether or not the DU operation resolved all of its dependencies. In the case of an Uninstall, this value is meaningless and SHOULD be true.

parameter.name: ExecutionUnitRefList
parameter.description: List of the Execution Units related to the affected DU.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time the operation on the DU was started in UTC.

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the operation on the DU was fully completed and applied in UTC.

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: Numerical fault code in case of operation failure.

parameter.name: OperationPerformed
parameter.description: The operation that was performed against the DU.
